  • Method Details

    • activateResident

      public Boolean activateResident(UUID residentId) throws Exception
      Updates a resident in the database to verified
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident being updated
      Returns:
      a boolean if the resident was successfully updated
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem updating the resident

    • deleteResident

      public Boolean deleteResident(UUID residentId) throws Exception
      Deletes a resident from the database TODO: eliminate a race condition!
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident being deleted
      Returns:
      a boolean if the resident was successfully deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there is a problem deleting the resident

    • findAdminByUsername

      public AdminEntity findAdminByUsername(String username) throws CredentialException
      Finds the admin by username. Uses the admin repository.
      Parameters:
      username - : username of the admin
      Returns:
      the id of the admin if the credentials are valid
      Throws:
      CredentialException - if the credentials are not valid

    • findBuildingsByAdminId

      public List<BuildingEntity> findBuildingsByAdminId(UUID adminId) throws Exception
      Retrieves a list of buildings the admin manages
      Parameters:
      adminId - : id of the admin
      Returns:
      a list of building entities
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown if no buildings could be found by the admin id

    • findResident

      public AdminResidentEntity findResident(UUID residentId) throws Exception
      Retrieve a resident by resident id.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      the admin resident entity
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if the resident could not be found

    • findResidents

      public List<AdminResidentEntity> findResidents(UUID buildingId, boolean verified, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable) throws Exception
      Retrieve a list of admin resident entities TODO: handle if buildingId is null
      Parameters:
      buildingId - : id of the building
      verified - : boolean if the residents of that building are verified or not
      pageable - : pagination information
      Returns:
      a list of admin resident entities
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if there no residents could be found

    • getNumberOfResidents

      public int getNumberOfResidents(UUID buildingId, boolean verified) throws Exception
      Does not throw an exception... okay if no residents are found because this method is used to check the number of unverified residents
      Parameters:
      buildingId - : id of the building
      verified - : if the residents are verified
      Returns:
      the number of residents
      Throws:
      Exception
